original_text: And led him away to Annas first; for he was father in law to Caiaphas, which was the high priest that same year.
korean_text: 먼저 안나스에게로 끌고 가니 안나스는 그 해의 대제사장인 가야바의 장인이라

sentences.original_text: And led him away to Annas first
for he was father in law to Caiaphas
which was the high priest that same year
